item.title: Algorithms-Code-Library.
item.description: C++ Implementation of variety of Algorithms and some mush have cheetsheets for CS Students. Link to github Cheet Sheets Trigonometry Cheat sheet Computer Science Cheat sheet : Mainly series, algorithm discrete math and calculus based cheat sheet. ICPC Cheatsheet : Outdated, may be helpful for beginners. Data Structure In no particular order, - Binary Indexed tree (BIT) - Heavy Light Decomposition (HLD) - Histrogram - LCA - RMQ - trie Geometry In no particular order,
